=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Dry Weightless Hair Volume and Texture Spray | Dry Texture Spray for Hair | Texturizing Spray | Sulfate and Cruelty Free 244ml (7oz)
Review Date: 2022/08/25
Store: Osensia
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'All, Dry, Fine', 'Liquid Volume': '7 Fluid Ounces', 'Brand': 'Osensia', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '7.0 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '8.03 x 1.93 x 1.89 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '850001832274'}
Review Text: I have been trying products that gives your hair the “textured” look.  I have used regularly during the Summer months and I found  that it did add volume to my hair.  It also doubles as a dry shampoo., as it absorbs oils from your hair.  Lastly, I felt that the aerosol sprayed out the product with a good amount of strength, which is a plus for me.
Review Title: Great Volume and Texturing Spray
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
[Upgrade] FUGACAL Hair Straightener Brush, 30s Fast Heating, 3 Temp Settings, Anti-Scald Design and 30mins Auto-Off, Bring You Ultra Straight Hair with Natural Shiny Look in Minutes
Fugacal
{'Brand': 'Fugacal', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Hair Type': 'Thick', 'Product Dimensions': '12.2 x 1.8 x 1.7 inches; 1.79 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'FG-HS01', 'Manufacturer': 'Fugacal'}
I am a habitual flat iron user and recently purchased a wet to dry heating tool/comb, but decided to take a chance on this straightening brush steamer: I must say:  I am quite impressed with this apparatus.  It took me a quick second to get in a groove of running it through my hair, but after a few times, it was pretty easy.  The tension/pull is really good and I liked how it left my hair.  My hair feels so smooth and I am pretty satisfied with how my hair turned out (after my first try)...
Really happy with this item

L'ANGE HAIR Argan-Infused Round Brush | Lightweight & Ergonomic Design | 53MM Tourmaline Ceramic Barrel
L'ANGE HAIR
{'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Shape': 'Round', 'Handle Material': 'Ceramic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Package Dimensions': '12.32 x 4.76 x 3.58 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2456', 'UPC': '810108191339'}
I found this round brush to be of high quality and easy to use.  I sometimes suffer from pain in my wrists due to typing often and found that this brush didn’t bother my wrists at all.  I have never used an Argan infused brush and I did feel a difference between this brush and one without Argan:  I did see that my hair felt smoother and less frizzy.  The price point is on the higher end, but I felt the quality was definitely worth it.
Great round brush for blow drying hair

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user's interest in hair styling tools has expanded to include texturizing products that enhance volume and styling versatility. They show a particular appreciation for high-quality sprays that effectively create textured looks while being suitable for varying hair types.
- **Performance Expectations:** The user continues to value quick heating and versatility in styling tools, now placing additional emphasis on products that provide strong application and functionality, such as those that can also serve multiple purposes, like a dry shampoo.
- **User Experience:** Ease of use remains a priority, particularly for beginners, with a growing inclination towards products that offer functional benefits, such as adding volume while absorbing excess oil.
- **Hair Type Consideration:** The user’s focus remains on products effective for thick hair, but they are increasingly receptive to solutions suitable for fine and dry hair.
- **Desired Outcome:** The user seeks products that enhance hair aesthetics and performance, reflected in their satisfaction with items that deliver noticeable volume and texture.
- **Safety Features:** Safety and secure application remain critical to their grooming routine, echoing an ongoing concern for effective yet safe products.
- **Satisfaction Level:** Consistently high satisfaction levels are demonstrated through enthusiastic ratings, underpinning their preference for premium, multifunctional, and effective hair care solutions.

Overall, the user is evolving towards a more comprehensive grooming regimen that blends performance, comfort, and innovative functionalities in their chosen products.
